text: @ScottMorrisonMP You have been doing well and I appreciate what you have been doing for Australia.  However,  why that big ship Ruby Princess was allowed to dock at Sydney Harbour when a few people on that ship had already tested positive for Coronavirus ? It is a bit troublesome, isn't it?
